descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Times New Roman][color=#ffff00][size=5]
[color=#ffffff][color=#ffff00]Blessed Silver Sword[/color] for Skyrim v1.1 Eng/Rus[/color][/size][/color][/font][font=Times New Roman][color=#ffff00][size=5][color=#ffffff][size=4]

[/size][/color][/size][/color][/font][/center][font=Times New Roman][size=3][color=#1e84cc]
[/color][color=#ffff00]Author:[/color]
Ronnie Magnum - meshes, textures

[color=#ffff00]Requirements:[/color]
Skyrim v1.9

[color=#ffff00]Description:[/color]
This mod adds new weapon - Blessed Silver Sword - that can be looted from the bandit at the Traitor's Post location, in the basement of the destroyed house (East from Windhelm). This weapon is very effective against undead creatures and can be upgraded with Silver ingot.

[center][/center]
[color=#ffff00]Sword stats:[/color]
Type: 1H sword.
Weight: 9
Damage: base 12, crit. 7
Enchantment: Causes 30 pts. of additional damage to undead creatures (that is 50% more effective than vanilla Silver Sword enchantment).
Reach: 1,0 (standard sword reach).
Speed: 1,0 (standard sword speed).
Improvement: 1 Silver ingot, required perk - Elven smithing.


[size=3][center][size=4][size=4][size=6]***[/size][/size][/size][/center]
[size=4]
Also:[/size]

Or join me on [url=https://www.patreon.com/RonnieMagnum/overview]Patreon[/url] if you like my works![/size]




[/size][/font]
author: Ronnie Magnum
